description: Test suite for the WatsonX agent and tools, including multiple test cases for tool invocation, streaming, asynchronous calls, and custom tools within the agno project.

methods.name: test_tool_use
methods.description: Tests basic tool invocation with the agent to get current stock price.

methods.name: test_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Tests streaming response with tool invocation.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Asynchronous streaming test for tool invocation.

methods.name: test_parallel_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple tool calls within a single response.

methods.name: test_multiple_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple different tools invoked in a single run.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_no_parameters
methods.description: Tests custom tool function with no parameters.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_optional_parameters
methods.description: Tests custom tool function with optional parameters.

methods.name: test_tool_call_list_parameters
methods.description: Tests tools handling multiple URLs and extracting information.
